{/* Animated background elements */}
{/* Cancel Icon */}
{/* Message */}

Order Cancelled

Your payment was not processed. Your cart items are still saved, and you can try again whenever you're ready.

{/* Info */}

What Happened?

  • ‚úì Your payment was not processed
  • ‚úì Your cart items are still saved
  • ‚úì No charges have been made to your account
  • ‚úì You can try checkout again or contact support for help
{/* Actions */}
Try Again Back to Store
{/* Support Info */}

Need Help?

If you're experiencing issues with checkout, our support team is here to help.

Contact Support
{/* FAQ */}

Common Issues

Why was my payment declined?

Common reasons include incorrect card details, insufficient funds, or security restrictions. Check your card details and try again, or contact your bank.

Are my items still in my cart?

Yes! Your cart items are saved. You can proceed to checkout whenever you're ready.

Which payment methods do you accept?

We accept both PayPal and Stripe (all major credit cards). If one doesn't work, try the other.

messages.message:
An empty interface declaration allows any non-nullish value, including literals like `0` and `""`.
- If that's what you want, disable this lint rule with an inline comment or configure the 'allowInterfaces' rule option.
- If you want a type meaning "any object", you probably want `object` instead.
- If you want a type meaning "any value", you probably want `unknown` instead.

suggestions.desc: Replace empty interface with `object`.
Replace empty interface with `unknown`.
